response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premium product, which I believe is perfectly suited to meet your needs and expectations. Given its high value and quality, I am confident it will bring significant benefits to you. Considering its worth and the exceptional features it offers, I kindly propose a price of $9,500 for this exclusive item. This offer allows you to acquire a top-tier solution at an attractive discount compared to its market value. Should you have any questions or require further information, please do not hesitate to reach out. I look forward to your positive response and the opportunity to serve you.", "product_price": 9500}
